content.text:
Winter in the mountains

Cosy chalets and charming holiday apartments await you in the most beautiful ski regions in Europe. Reserve your holiday home in the alps of Switzerland, Austria or France for a fantastic time on your next winter holiday. There is enough to do for the young and the young at heart, thrill seekers and après ski lovers alike. Discover top regions such as Grisons, Valais, Tyrol or the Val Thorens. 
Booking a holiday home is the perfect way to start planning your holiday. After a great day out in the snow and sun, come home to your cosy chalet or apartment to warm up and dry off by the fire with some hot chocolate before heading out to take part in the grand tradition of Après ski.

Ideas for your winter holidays

Get inspired by our most attractive and popular holiday homes and apartments. How about a place that’s close to the slopes for this winter? Whether you’re looking for a cosy chalet for the whole family or a charming apartment for two, with our broad selection you will certainly find what you are looking for.

Dream destinations for your winter holidays

Spend your winter holidays in the most gorgeous winter regions in Austria, Switzerland, France, Italy or Germany. Discover breathtaking mountain views, popular skiing regions and picturesque winter worlds or enjoy a cosy 'kota' in Skandinavia and the polarlights of Lapland. Wherever you want to go: our selection has your personal dream winter home in Europe´s most beautiful winter regions.
